definition[0]: an organization for boys that teaches them practical skills
definition[1]: a boy who is a member of this organization
definition[2]: a girl who is a member of an organization for girls that teaches them practical things
definition[3]: a soldier, plane etc that is sent to search the area in front of an army and get information about the enemy
example[0]: He sent three scouts ahead to take a look at the bridge.
definition[4]: someone whose job is to look for good sports players, musicians etc in order to employ them
example[1]: He was spotted by a scout at the age of 13.
definition[5]: to look for something in a particular area
example[2]: Iâ€™m scouting round for a place to stay.
definition[6]: to examine a place or area in order to get information about it
example[3]: American companies are keen to scout out business opportunities in Vietnam.
definition[7]: to find out about the abilities of sports players, musicians etc in order to employ them
